data.label: 一键登录和本机号码校验
data.description: 号码认证服务，整合三大运营商网关认证能力，在用户无感知过程中实现基于手机号码一键完成登录或认证，升级传统短信验证方式，提升用户体验、提高注册转化率、保障业务流程安全； 通信授权服务，提供用户授权数据实时存证、查询和管理能力，授权过程可知可信可追溯，应用于短信、语音等业务场景。

data.label: One-click Login and Mobile Number Verification
data.description: Number authentication service integrates the gateway authentication capabilities of the three major operators, achieving one-click login or authentication based on mobile numbers during the user's unconscious process, upgrading the traditional SMS verification method, enhancing user experience, improving registration conversion rate, and ensuring business process security; Communication authorization service provides real-time deposit, query, and management capabilities of user authorization data, with the authorization process being known, trustworthy, and traceable, applicable to business scenarios such as SMS and voice.
